src_original: tiṣṭhatvādipañcakena navamī /  yathāyathetyādinā kauśikaḥ puṇyātirekopapattimāha /  sādhu sādhvityādinā taṃ subhūtiḥ sopapattikaṃ protsāhayati /  ityadhimātrādhimātrā praśaṃsā //

pariśuddhakāyasamudācārastathāgato nāsti tasyāpariśuddhakāyasamudācāratā yāṃ tathāgataḥ  praticchādayitavyāṃ manyeta kaccitpare na jānīyurityetatprathamamarakṣyam evaṃ vākkarma dvitīyam /  evaṃ manaḥkarma tṛtīyam //
'trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni' yathāpāṭham- “tathāgatasya dharma deśayata ekatyāḥ śuśrūṣante /
na tena tathāgatasya nandī bhavati na saumanasyaṃ na cetasa utplāvitatvam /
na tena tathāgatasya dvayaṃ bhavati nandī āghātaśca /
'vāsanāsamuddhāta' iti /  prahīṇakleśasyāpi yadaprahīṇakleśasyeva ceṣṭitaṃ sā kleśavāsanā /  sāpi tathāgatasyāstaṅgateti samudghātakleśavāsanaḥ sa bhagavānucyate //
